ohloh.description: SlapOS allows one to turn any application into SaaS (Service as a System), PaaS (Platform as a Service) or IaaS (Infrastructure as a Service) without loosing your freedom.
ohloh.name: SlapOS

description: [SlapOS](http://community.slapos.org) is a decentralized Cloud Computing technology. It can automate the deployment and configuration of applications in a heterogeneous environment, either in datacenters or self-hosted. SlapOS is a Free Software (GPL).
name: SlapOS
